name: runc
description:
CLI tool for spawning containers on Linux according to the OCI
specification

dependencies.name: go
dependencies.description: The golang compiler and build environment

dependencies.name: go-md2man
dependencies.description: go-md2man converts markdown into roff (man pages)

dependencies.name: pkgconfig
dependencies.description:
pkgconf is a program which helps to configure compiler and linker flags
for development frameworks. It is similar to pkg-config from
freedesktop.org, providing additional functionality while also
maintaining compatibility.

dependent_to.name: sarus
dependent_to.description: Sarus is an OCI-compliant container engine for HPC systems.

dependent_to.name: podman
dependent_to.description:
An optionally rootless and daemonless container engine: alias
docker=podman
